Rebounding Dance.name: Rebounding Dance
Rebounding Dance.flavor: You become a silver blur as you speed through your foes, striking so fast that they cannot retaliate.
Rebounding Dance.effect: You have concealment until the end of your next turn, and you shift a number of squares equal to your speed + your Charisma modifier. You make the following attack against one or two creatures during this movement.
Rebounding Dance.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Aspect of Quicksilver Strides.name: Aspect of Quicksilver Strides
Aspect of Quicksilver Strides.flavor: Your foe suffers with each failed attack it makes against you, even as you attain maximum mobility in battle.
Aspect of Quicksilver Strides.effect: After the at-will attack, you shift half your speed. In addition, one creature hit by the attack takes extra damage equal to your Charisma modifier.
Aspect of Quicksilver Strides.onHit: 5[W] + Constitution modifier damage. In addition, the target is marked and takes 5 psychic damage whenever it misses you with an attack (save ends both).

Absorb Momentum.name: Absorb Momentum
Absorb Momentum.flavor: An enemy’s attempt to force you across the battlefield only increases your mobility.
Absorb Momentum.trigger: An enemy’s attack pulls, pushes, or slides you
Absorb Momentum.effect: You negate the forced movement and gain a +4 power bonus to speed until the end of the encounter.
